name: Lockdown on Titan
description:
You are locked down on Saturn's moon, Titan. Swarmed by angry guards who will stop you at any cost, you must unlock nine beacons to unlock the portal to get off the moon.
How to play: Hover over a beacon for three seconds to unlock it. After you unlock all nine, a portal opens at your start location. That is your way out! A minimap in the bottom left corner will guide you.

W: Accelerate forward

S: Accelerate backward

A: Rotate counterclockwise

D: Rotate clockwise

J: Fire (You can hold for rapid fire. Careful, your ammo takes time to replenish.)

Arrow keys and the left mouse button are alternate controls.

Lockdown on Titan was created for the Orange County Lockdown Jam.
